name: europocentric
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
seen from the point of view of Europe or European people, or considering Europe or Europeans to be the most important: My main objection to this system is the fact that it is Europocentric. Even Europocentric writers acknowledged the importance of Egypt in European history. Traditional international law can be described as basically europocentric. Synonym
Eurocentric
More examplesFewer examplesThe history taught in European schools was shamelessly Europocentric.He was essentially a Europocentric writer, and paid little attention to the world outside Europe. We need to avoid discussing history from a Europocentric point of view.
